teaser: Sadie Stein, Deputy Editor of The Paris Review, gives us some news from Iceland that may either make you want to emigrate – or want to stay away for fear of creative competition. A new BBC report names Iceland’s 300,000 residents the most bookish of world citizenries.
title: Every Viking Gives Birth to a Book
description: Sadie Stein, Deputy Editor of The Paris Review, gives us some news from Iceland that may either make you want to emigrate – or want to stay away for fear of creative competition. A new BBC report names Iceland’s 300,000 residents the most bookish of world citizenries.

contentencoded: Sadie Stein, Deputy Editor of The Paris Review, gives us some news from Iceland that may either make you want to emigrate – or want to stay away for fear of creative competition. A new BBC report names Iceland’s 300,000 residents the most bookish of world citizenries.
